TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {41365=Active Camouflage:- Unlike the Stealth Harness active camouflage is not meant to be used in combat. Merely to get into position. A unit with Active Camouflage has the Deep Strike and Infiltrate special rules and does not Scatter when Deep Striking. May charge rather than shooting on the turn they Deep Strike.}
textBeforeTable: Excavate: Two or more models in this formation may combine all of their shooting attacks that turn into a single attack. Nominate one Locust as the firer, and any number of others as contributors. All contributors must have line of sight to the firer. For the duration of that turn, the firing Locusts Boring Laser has the Twin-Linked special rule and uses whichever profile below is appropriate to the number of contributing to the number of contributing Locusts. Special Rules: Composition: 3-5 Locusts Formation Type: Armoured Spearhead Mining Swarm of Absolution[edit] Though these are all given a formation type, they only benefit from being a formation type in games of apocalypse. Covenant Formations[edit] Vehicular Energy Shielding- A powerful energy field protects the vehicle. Grants a 2++ invulnerable save. Each layer of Vehicular Energy Shielding only protects against a single glancing or penetrating hit per shooting phase and has no effect against melee attacks. Vehicle Wargear[edit] Active Camouflage:- Unlike the Stealth Harness active camouflage is not meant to be used in combat. Merely to get into position. A unit with Active Camouflage has the Deep Strike and Infiltrate special rules and does not Scatter when Deep Striking. May charge rather than shooting on the turn they Deep Strike. Enhanced PD
textAfterTable: Range S AP Type Cleansing Beam Unlimited 10 1 Ordnance D3, Apocalyptic Barrage, Ignores Cover Truth's Judgement of Fury[edit] Formation Type: Battle Formation Composition: 1+ Scarabs Special Rules: Judgement: If a Scarab from this formation shoots at a unit that has already been targeted by a different Scarab from this formation this phase, then the Scarab gets a +1 bonus to its Destroyer rolls and rolls on the vehicle damage chart. Mercy's Holy Crusaders[edit] Six entire mixed squads of different Elite-Units. Covenant Aerial Swarm[edit] Formation Type: Flyer Wing Composition: 3-5 Vampires Special Rules: Stasis Bomb: All Penetrating hits caused by the Stasis Beams of the Vampires in this formation automatically inflict a Crash and Burn result on the vehicle damage table when used against flyers. Vampirism Network: The Vampiric Repair special rule can by used to restore Hull Points to every Vampire in the Covenant Aerial Swarm. Note that the Vampiric Repair special rule will still only restore a single hull point for each time that it damages a vehicle. Artifact Retrieval
